text: Wieder Rekord-Brände in Brasilien: Daten des brasilianischen Weltrauminstituts zeigen, dass es im Mai in Amazonien und Cerrado die höchste Zahl von Bränden seit 2007 gab. Die Brände werden überwiegend absichtlich gelegt, um Flächen für die #Landwirtschaft zu roden. #savetheamazon
text_en: Record fires in Brazil again: data from the Brazilian Space Institute show that in May there was the highest number of fires in the Amazon and Cerrado since 2007. Most of the fires are started deliberately to clear areas for #agriculture. #savetheamazon

@SPatuanelli

text: Para evitar o colapso dos ecossistemas do planeta, o PNUMA/ONU calcula que basta investir 0,1% do PIB do planeta, ou U$ 536 bilhões. Proteger áreas naturais, gerenciar poluição e investir em florestas e agricultura restaurativa nos daria tranquilidade por três décadas.

text: @HentaiOuji11 @RPPNoticias Y si subvenciona la agricultura (si es q tenemos todas las condiciones - cantidad y calidad de terrenos, clima, tec, etc). Y sin q eso afecte q a aquellos países que ya no le compramos, ellos sí nos sigan comprando. Para qué michi cerramos las importaciones?

text: Nu grönskas det! Tack vare samarbetet mellan ett tjugotal lantbruk och markägare i norr samt en lokal ciderproducent i Vännäs utanför Umeå ska 12 000 äppelträd snart planteras. Målet är att öka den lokala förädlingen och bidra till en blomstrande region.
text_en: Now it's green! Thanks to the collaboration between about twenty farmers and landowners in the north and a local cider producer in Vännäs outside Umeå, 12,000 apple trees will soon be planted. The goal is to increase local breeding and contribute to a thriving region.

text: @StineBHelles @twitevit @ibenkr2 @danishcrown Det er nytteløst at diskutere klima med en national præmis. Danmark har specialiseret sig i landbrug, og derfor er der meget landbrug, men f.eks. ingen bilproduktion. I EU er landbrug 10% af de samlede udledninger - for livsnødvendige produkter der konsumeres 3 gange om dagen.
text_en: @StineBHelles @twitevit @ ibenkr2 @danishcrown It is useless to discuss climate with a national premise. Denmark specializes in agriculture, and therefore there is a lot of agriculture, but e.g. no car production. In the EU, agriculture accounts for 10% of total emissions - for vital products consumed 3 times a day.

text:
Åbent spørgsmål til Rasmus Prehn - dag 36 

Ofte hører vi at dyrene i naturen også lever et hårdt og ubarmhjertig liv. Det bliver endda brugt som argument og retfærdiggørelse af hvordan dyrene behandles i industrilandbruget. 
#dkpol #landbrug #dyrevelfærd #dkgris #dksvin
text_en: Open question to Rasmus Prehn - day 36 We often hear that the animals in nature also live a hard and relentless life. It is even used as an argument and justification of how animals are treated in industrial agriculture. #dkpol #landbrug # dyrevelfærd #dkgris #dksvin

text: @JonneMi Suomi harjoittaa EU:n erikoisluvalla kannattamatonta maataloutta - täällä tuet ovat Euroopan korkeimmat ja Suomi maksaa tuplasti enemmän tukea kuin mitä maatalous itsessään tuottaa. Meillä on myös muista EU-maista poiketen erityisoikeus maksaa kansallisia tukia EU-tukien lisäksi.
text_en: @JonneMi Finland engages in unprofitable agriculture with the special permission of the EU - here the subsidies are the highest in Europe and Finland pays twice as much subsidy as what agriculture itself produces. Unlike other EU countries, we also have the special right to pay national subsidies in addition to EU subsidies.

text: @pantljicara1 @zamenikzamenika Pa sad, zavisi koliko gledate unazad. Ljudska vrsta postoji 2.5 miliona godina, evoluirala je na mesu i divljem bilju, poljoprivreda se pojavila tek pre 12.000 godina, tako da smo prirodno ipak mesožderi pre svega. I da, bili smo mnogo zdraviji i jači pre poljoprivrede.
text_en: @ pantljicara1 @zamenikzamenika So now, it depends on how much you look back. The human species has existed for 2.5 million years, it evolved on meat and wild plants, agriculture appeared only 12,000 years ago, so we are naturally carnivores first and foremost. And yes, we were much healthier and stronger before agriculture.

text: Kod izbora navodnjavanja gledamo kako kulture morfološki izgledaju. Ako su stabljika i list obrasli dlačicama, savjetuje se sustav kapanjem, a u suprotnom kišenje, kaže izv. prof. dr. sc. Tomislav Vinković s FAZOS-a. #poljoprivreda #navodnjavanje #agroklub
text_en: When choosing irrigation, we look at how crops look morphologically. If the stem and leaf are overgrown with hairs, it is advisable to drip the system, and otherwise rain, says Assoc. prof. dr. sc. Tomislav Vinković from FAZOS. #agriculture #irrigation #agroklub

text: Danas ću opet morati slušati kako je naša poljoprivreda dostiže vrhunac u razvoju, a moram da ćutim. Odem u selo i vidim da su proizvođači na istom nivou kao u vrijeme bana Kulina.
text_en: Today, I will have to listen again as our agriculture reaches its peak in development, and I must remain silent. I go to the village and see that the producers are at the same level as in the time of Ban Kulin.
